alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 15 at 11:27AM EST until December 16 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the French Broad River At Blantyre affecting Henderson and Transylvania Counties... ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...French Broad River At Blantyre. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, most farm fields are flooding between the French Broad River and Brevard Rd, and between the River and Pleasant Grove Rd. Floodwaters begin to impact boat access areas at Grove Bridge Rd. and Crab Creek Rd as the river rises toward 16.0 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 14.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to near flood stage later today or tonight. - Action stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. For detailed information including observed and forecast stages, flood impacts, flood history, FEMA Flood Hazard Layers, and more, please visit: https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=gsp
